Articles.Content: Hello, i'm searching for a Mod that shows the Drag of an ship? I 'm know about the F12 Option, but thats only colored arrows... I need exactly ingame information ^^
FAR has it, but also changes the aerodynamics system

You don't need a mod - this information is in stock:

Alt-F12 -> Physics -> Aero -> Display Aero Data GUI

That shows whole-ship aerodynamic data including total drag.  The option above it ('Display Aero Data in Action Menus') shows individual part information in its right-click menu
Mutch thanks @fourfa! I totally forget this "secret" Option... ^^
